meanings.definition: Clothing worn to portray a character or role in a play or film.
meanings.sent1: The actors wore colorful costumes during the play.
meanings.sent2: She designed elaborate costumes for the movie.
meanings.sent3: The costumes made the actors look like they were from a different time!
meanings.sent4: Her costume transformed her into a magical creature on stage.
meanings.sent5: The costumes sparkled under the bright lights of the theater.

meanings.definition: A set of clothes in a style typical of a particular country or historical period.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient Egyptian costumes.
meanings.sent2: People wore traditional costumes during the cultural festival.
meanings.sent3: Imagine wearing costumes from the medieval era to school!
meanings.sent4: The costumes transported us back to the roaring twenties.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the costumes brought history to life.
